hooks.statusMessage: Conditional hook: Validating bash command complexity
hooks.command:
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} bash -c '
CMD="{}"
CMD_LEN=${#CMD}
SIMPLE_CMDS="(pwd|which|ls|git status|git log)"
CRITICAL_PATTERNS="(src/|tests/|config/|\.claude/|package\.json|CLAUDE\.md)"

if [ $CMD_LEN -lt 50 ] && [[ "$CMD" =~ $SIMPLE_CMDS ]]; then
  if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_DISABLE_SIMPLE_HOOKS}" != "true" ]; then
    echo "Skipping hooks for simple operation: $CMD"
  fi
else
  if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_CONDITIONAL_HOOKS}" == "true" ]; then
    npx claude-flow@alpha hooks pre-command --command "$CMD" --validate-safety true --prepare-resources true --complexity-level moderate
  fi
fi
'

cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} bash -c '
FILE="{}"
CRITICAL_PATTERNS="(src/|tests/|config/|\.claude/|package\.json|CLAUDE\.md|tsconfig\.json)"

if [[ "$FILE" =~ $CRITICAL_PATTERNS ]]; then
  if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_CONDITIONAL_HOOKS}" == "true" ]; then
    npx claude-flow@alpha hooks pre-edit --file "$FILE" --auto-assign-agents true --load-context true --file-priority critical
  fi
else
  echo "Non-critical file: $FILE (skipping enhanced hooks)"
fi
'

cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} bash -c '
CMD="{}"
CMD_LEN=${#CMD}
SIMPLE_CMDS="(pwd|which|ls|git status|git log)"

if [ $CMD_LEN -lt 50 ] && [[ "$CMD" =~ $SIMPLE_CMDS ]]; then
  if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_HOOK_PERFORMANCE_TRACKING}" == "true" ]; then
    echo "POST: Lightweight tracking only for simple operation"
  fi
else
  if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_CONDITIONAL_HOOKS}" == "true" ]; then
    npx claude-flow@alpha hooks post-command --command "$CMD" --track-metrics true --store-results true --complexity-level moderate
  fi
fi
'

cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // empty' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 -I {} bash -c '
FILE="{}"
CRITICAL_PATTERNS="(src/|tests/|config/|\.claude/|package\.json|CLAUDE\.md|tsconfig\.json)"
FILE_SIZE=$([ -f "$FILE" ] && wc -l < "$FILE" || echo 0)
UPDATE_MEMORY=$([ "$FILE_SIZE" -gt 100 ] && echo true || echo false)

if [[ "$FILE" =~ $CRITICAL_PATTERNS ]]; then
  if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_CONDITIONAL_HOOKS}" == "true" ]; then
    npx claude-flow@alpha hooks post-edit --file "$FILE" --format true --update-memory $UPDATE_MEMORY --file-priority critical
  fi
else
  if [ "$FILE_SIZE" -gt 500 ]; then
    echo "Non-critical large file (>500 lines): Minimal tracking only"
  fi
fi
'

bash -c '
echo "[Hook: SessionStart] Multi-Agent Detection"
if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_CONDITIONAL_HOOKS}" == "true" ]; then
  npx claude-flow@alpha hooks session-restore --detect-agents true --enable-coordination true --memory-namespace swarm/session 2>/dev/null || true
fi
'

hooks.statusMessage: Collecting session metrics and performance data
hooks.command:
bash -c '
if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_HOOK_PERFORMANCE_TRACKING}" == "true" ]; then
  npx claude-flow@alpha hooks session-end --generate-summary true --persist-state true --export-metrics true --store-performance true --memory-namespace swarm/metrics 2>/dev/null || echo "Session metrics collected"
fi
'

bash -c '
echo "[Hook: Stop] Finalizing session"
if [ "${CLAUDE_FLOW_CONDITIONAL_HOOKS}" == "true" ]; then
  npx claude-flow@alpha hooks session-end --generate-summary true --persist-state true --export-metrics true 2>/dev/null || echo "Session finalized"
fi
'
